pages.text: $(li)The End Castle is a big structure that can be found over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Inside, the Illagers guard multiples relics and the most important structure, the $(l:patchouli:enders_journey/end_portal)End Portal$(/l).$(br)$(li)A Master $(l:patchouli:villagers/cartographer)Cartographer$(/l) can give you a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/map)Map$(/l) to find this remote place.
